sen.j: 梅若 吉之丞（うめわか きちのじょう）とは、シテ方観世流の一派、梅若六郎家の分家の一つ、梅若吉之丞家の当主が用いる名。
sen.e: Kichinojo UMEWAKA is a name used by the head of the Kichinojo Umewaka family, one of the branch families of the Rokuro UMEWAKA family, a school of shite-kata (main roles) of Kanze school.

Kichinojo UMEWAKA is a name used by the head of the Kichinojo Umewaka family, one of the branch families of the Rokuro Umewaka family, which is one of the schools of the shite-kata (actors who play leading characters in Noh performances) Kanze school.
sen.cmt: シテ方観世流→the shite-kata (actors who play leading characters in Noh performances) Kanze school として他の記事と統一しました。
sen.e: Kichinojo UMEWAKA is a name used by the head of the Kichinojo Umewaka family, one of the branch families of the Rokuro Umewaka family, which is one of the schools of the shite-kata (actors who play leading characters in Noh performances) Kanze school.

sen.j: 長らく途絶えていたが、梅若万三郎 (初世)が継承。
sen.e: The line had long been failed, but Manzaburo UMEWAKA (the first) succeeded.
The line had long been failed, but Manzaburo UMEWAKA (the first) succeeded.
The line had long been failed, but Manzaburo UMEWAKA (the first) succeeded.

sen.j: そのままとなっていたものを万三郎の孫が再継承。
sen.e: It remained not being succeeded, but then, Manzaburo's grandchild succeeded again.
It remained not being succeeded, but then, Manzaburo's grandchild succeeded again.
It remained not being succeeded, but then, Manzaburo's grandchild succeeded again.

sen.j: 近年、梅若吉之丞 (5世)を継承。
sen.e: In recent years, he succeeded Kichinojo UMEWAKA (the fifth).
In recent years, he succeeded Kichinojo UMEWAKA (the fifth).
In recent years, he succeeded Kichinojo UMEWAKA (the fifth).
